title: [Ta'Illistim, Postern Gate]
description: Built near the city's high walls is a pale grey stone enclosure with a carved mistwood gate.  Inside the fence is a courtyard leading up to a white-paneled cottage.  Barely visible above the top of the crenellated facade are the windows and high turrets of BriarStone Keep, its lapis-tiled roofs glinting in the moonlight.  Winding away from the postern gate is a small trail that travels towards the mountains.

Peace descends outside the gate, as the high walls of the city block most of the sound emanating from within.  Barely visible above the top of the crenellated wall are the windows and high turrets of BriarStone Keep, its lapis-tiled roofs glinting in the moonlight.  A small trail winds towards the mountainside.

A small trail winds towards the mountainside.
